impact-statement: Sensory neurons that monitor ambient oxygen control a cascade of responses across multiple layers of interneurons to switch the global state of the nematode <italic>C. elegans</italic>, reprogramming behavior and gene expression to enable escape from or adaptation to surface exposure.
